mapper.select: SELECT atch.id, atch.publish_version_id, atch.app_service_code, atch.source, atch.target, atch.project_id, atch.organization_id, atch.object_version_number, atch.created_by, atch.creation_date, atch.last_updated_by, atch.last_update_date FROM agile_tag_compare_history atch WHERE atch.id IN ( SELECT MAX( id ) FROM agile_tag_compare_history WHERE publish_version_id = #{publishVersionId} AND project_id = #{projectId} AND organization_id = #{organizationId} GROUP BY app_service_code )
